catalog_info.title: Junior Tutorial in Archaeology
catalog_info.notes: Required of candidates for honors in Archaeology.
catalog_info.description: This individual tutorial for archaeology students intending to write a senior thesis is normally undertaken with a member of the faculty during the second term of junior year. To enroll, a student must submit a petition form (available from the Head Tutor for Archaeology, or downloadable from the department's Anthropology [Archaeology] website) with a proposed course plan of study and the tutorial adviser's signature.
